name: Empoleon
author: Naoki Saito
flavor_text: If anyone were to hurt its pride, it would slash them with wings that can cleave through an ice floe.

abilities.name: Diving Draw
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may discard a card from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

attacks.name: Attack Command
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage times the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent’s).
